text: The men's 1500 metres event at the 1984 European Athletics Indoor Championships was held on 3 and 4 March.Results (p. 497) ==Medalists== {| class="wikitable" style="text-align:left" |- align="center" | width=200 bgcolor=gold|Gold||width=200 bgcolor=silver|Silver|| width=200 bgcolor=CC9966|Bronze |- |Peter Wirz '''' |Riccardo Materazzi '''' |Thomas Wessinghage '''' |} ==Results== ===Heats=== First 2 from each heat (Q) and the next 4 fastest (q) qualified for the final. {| class="wikitable sortable" style="text-align:center" |- !Rank !!
